text:
S: Yes… yeah, yeeesss oh no no no oh, ah!
Oh, hello! I am playing on my computer. I

am playing my favourite computer game. Do
you like computer games? Hey, what was that?

Uh, there it was again! No! What´s that?
Look, it´s a dinosaur. A toy dinosaur. Very

strange… Au!!! Ouh, what was that? I think
it was a ball. What´s going on? Oh oh what

a mess! Look, so many toys. What toys can
you see? I can see cars… teddy bears…

dolls… trains… balls… planes… dinosaurs…
Oh oh and there are more toys coming from

the toy box. What is going on? Look out! There
is a doll… a teddy bear… a plane… a

ball… a dinosaur… a car… oh and oh auuu!
Oh, who is making this mess with these dinosaurs

and dolls and teddy bears, toy cars, toy trains,
toy planes uh oh, and balls! Uh, wait a minute…

Where is Maggie? Maggie!
M: Yes Steve? Hey, what´s going on? Why are

you lying down? Are you sleeping?
S: No Maggie, I am not sleeping but I am angry!

M: Oh dear.
S: I mean, look at this… what can you see?

M: Ehm ehm…
S: No hey look, this, what´s this, what is

it? Tell Maggie what this is?
M: It’s a dinosaur.

S: Yes, it´s a dinosaur… on the floor!
And… and look, look what´s this? What is

it? Tell Maggie, tell Maggie… what is this…
M: A doll!

S: Yes, it´s a doll! On the floor! And hey…
hey… look… look what´s this? What´s

this?
Yes, tell Maggie.

M: a… a… teddy bear?
S: It´s a teddy bear.

M: Yeah.
S: On the floor! And here? What´s this? Tell

her!
M: It´s a plane.

S: Yeah, a plane. All these things on the
floor. Ho, what is it all together?

M: All my toys.
S: No Maggie, it´s a mess! It´s crazy! What

are you doing?
M: I am looking for my pencil case.

S: Your pencil case? I think your pencil case
is in my wardrobe!

M: Oh, great, thanks Steve. Yeah…
S: What a naughty bird! But hey, at least

we learnt about toys. Toys everywhere I hope
your bedroom isn’t so messy. Aaahhh… Maggie,

have you found your pencil case yet?
M: No, not yet.

S: Oh Maggie! Oh, Maggie… You naughty naughty
bird! Stop it! Stop it! Ooohh aaahhhh…
